backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko actor types for training sessions, belt progress, user profiles, techniques, goals, and analytics structures; core backend data model with no functions shown.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, related files, components, and test references for analytics updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, features, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for UI colors and layout.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_105.md: Documentation for clean rebuild and redeploy of Draft 105 with no functional changes, including validation steps and rebuild procedure.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_110.md: Documentation for clean rebuild and redeploy of Draft 110 outlining checks and deployment commands without code changes.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_115.md: Clean rebuild and redeploy checklist for Draft 115 confirming no code or schema changes and listing deployment steps.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_94.md: Rebuild and redeploy checklist for Draft 94 detailing prerequisites and build steps with no functional modifications.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_105.md: Template-style redeploy note for Draft 105 capturing deployment steps, status, and placeholders for IDs and notes.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_110.md: Redeploy note for Draft 110 including deployment steps, status options, and fields for error reporting.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_115.md: Draft 115 redeploy note template documenting deployment info, steps executed, and any failing steps.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_TEMPLATE.md: Generic redeploy note template with sections for deployment scope, failure location, and error output.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_105.md: Post-deployment smoke check for Draft 105 covering login screen rendering and basic load validation.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_110.md: Smoke check template for Draft 110 verifying initial load, login screen, and console errors.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_115.md: Smoke check for Draft 115 confirming application loads correctly and Internet Identity login appears without errors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component controlling auth flow, backend actor readiness, profile loading, and rendering screens accordingly.
frontend/src/components/AddTechniqueDial: Dialog for creating a technique with fields, YouTube thumbnail generation, tags, and category selection.
frontend/src/components/AddTrainingDialo: Dialog for adding or editing training sessions with date, duration, theme, mood, intensity, and roll tracking.
frontend/src/components/BeltTracker.tsx: Displays and updates belt progress using profile, training, and submission data with gamified stats.
frontend/src/components/CachedImage.tsx: Image component that preloads images with fallback support and loading state styling.
frontend/src/components/DebugOverlay.tsx: Debug overlay component showing actor initialization state, logs, and warnings with a toggleable panel UI.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with branding, profile access, theme toggle, debug mode toggle, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen that initiates Internet Identity authentication with a styled welcome and feature preview.
frontend/src/components/Profile.tsx: Empty placeholder component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileAnalytics: Profile analytics view computing training stats, submissions, streaks, and rendering profile and activity insights.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation/edit form allowing users to set personal details, belt rank, gym info, and profile picture.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionLogSec: Manages a user's submission log by belt level, syncing with backend data, detecting unsaved changes, and providing UI controls to add, remove, and save submissions.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionSelect: Provides a searchable popover input for selecting submissions, filtering out selected ones, and adding new selections via keyboard or click.
frontend/src/components/TechniqueLibrary: Displays a searchable and filterable list of techniques by category, with an option to add new techniques.
Renders a yearly training heatmap by mapping session durations to daily cells with dynamic theme support.
frontend/src/components/TrainingHoursHea: Generates a weekly ISO‑aligned heatmap grid for training hours and provides UI to edit, save, and clear recorded hours.
frontend/src/components/TrainingLog.tsx: Main training log UI that loads sessions, computes analytics, and renders charts, stats, and dialogs for adding or editing sessions.
frontend/src/components/TrainingMonthCal: Monthly calendar view that groups sessions by date, displays training indicators, and supports month navigation and session editing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWrapper.ts: Enhanced actor initialization hook with step tracking, logging, and identity-based actor creation with optional admin token setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useDragToScroll.ts: Hook enabling drag-to-scroll behavior on an element using pointer events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication lifecycle, identity loading, login, and logout behaviors.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for loading and mutating user profile, registration, and training data via an actor wrapper with caching and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers defining theme variables, BJJ color utilities, dark mode overrides, and heat‑map scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/lib/beltStatsCalculator.ts: Computes belt progression, experience, submission proficiency, and technique mastery stats from training sessions and submission logs.
frontend/src/lib/beltUtils.ts: Provides helpers to get belt image URLs, belt names, and preload all belt‑related image assets.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Maps session theme enum values to human‑readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/imageCache.ts: Simple in‑memory image preload cache to avoid flicker and allow clearing cached entries.
frontend/src/lib/intensityUtils.ts: Defines intensity options and helpers for labels, short codes, colors, and numeric conversions.
frontend/src/lib/moodIcons.ts: Maps mood ratings to generated mood icon assets and labels, with helpers to fetch all icons.
frontend/src/lib/submissionLogUtils.ts: Utility functions to normalize, find, add, remove, increment, decrement, and merge submission entries in a submission log.
frontend/src/lib/submissionOptions.ts: Exports a constant array of all BJJ submission names and a corresponding union type.
frontend/src/lib/trainingAnalytics.ts: Provides functions for analyzing training data, including theme frequency, intensity averages, submission counts, and time‑bucketed roll statistics.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility helpers for class merging, date formatting, ISO weekday handling, heatmap coloring, and generating year heatmap grids.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, sets up query client and Internet Identity provider, and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI with tab navigation for analytics, training logs, belts, and techniques.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema version, a high-level description of the ICP Jiu-Jitsu Journey app, and a list of existing features including authentication, actor initialization, secret-token handling, RBAC, React Query hooks, and user-profile APIs.
